description: Try our easy to follow Mini Lamb Sausage Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Lamb Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Simply Heat Slow Cooked for 6 hours Lamb Shoulder with Garlic & Rosemary

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each sheet of puff pastry in half. Spread each piece with lamb, then crumble over feta and sprinkle with rosemary. Roll up tightly and cut each log into five pieces. Brush with egg, sprinkle with sesame seeds and place onto prepared trays. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown and serve with tomato sauce.

Brush with egg, sprinkle with sesame seeds and place onto prepared trays. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown and serve with tomato sauce.
